root: ^>>Only a few weeks have passed, and we've already been getting so many new reports and requests!
^Well, I say "we", but I myself haven't been assigned to any of them for some reason...
^And Detective Toadshoe seems extremely stressed from all the new work.
^I wish I could help, but no one will talk to me or tell me what's going on.
^Surely this doesn't have anything to do with the case I worked on, right...?
^I mean, it was Buff Frog, wasn't it?
^I keep hearing rumors that the sudden increase in crime rate is because of Buff Frog's arrest, but those are just rumors...
^After all, I was the one who was actually there, right...?
^It's not like...I'm the reason for all this chaos...
